name: luminous-moss
effect: Held: If the holder is hit by a damaging Water move, it consumes this item and raises its Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Held: If the holder is hit by a damaging Water move, raises its Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.x-y:
An item to be held by a Pokémon.
It boosts Sp. Def if hit with a Water-
type attack. It can only be used once.
